about.short: I'm Adam Khairi, a Web Developer & Web Designer.
about.long: Motivated and skilled Web Developer with over 3 years of experience in front-end and back-end development. Proficient in Angular, .NET, and other web technologies. Strong problem-solving abilities and a keen eye for detail. Adept at working in fast-paced environments and committed to delivering high-quality software solutions.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Experienced in building robust and scalable web applications using Angular to create dynamic and interactive user interfaces, and backend development with PHP and Laravel to manage data and implement business logic.

services.title: Technical Writing
services.description: Proficient in creating technical documents and user guides that effectively communicate complex information to a wide audience.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: Specializing in creating mobile applications for a seamless user experience on smartphones and tablets.

services.title: Email Development
services.description: Crafting email templates and designing email campaigns for effective communication and marketing purposes.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for websites to enhance user engagement.

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: Designing unique and creative graphics for branding, marketing materials, and digital content.
